intent: Design a flange suitable for FDM 3D printing with specified dimensions and features.

global_params.research_summary: Material properties for FDM include PLA, ABS, and PETG, each with unique strengths. DfAM constraints for FDM involve minimum wall thickness of 0.8 mm and hole diameter of 2.0 mm. Overhangs should be self-supporting above 45°.

manufacturing_constraints.orientation_notes: Orient to minimize support material and improve surface finish on critical faces

sources: Guide to FDM Materials and Their Properties
Design for Additive Manufacturing: FDM Constraints
FDM 3D Printing: Minimum Wall Thickness and Hole Diameter

constraints: Ensure flange can be printed without additional support structures.
